title: Where would be a good location to open a department store? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is way to big a question to answer. Simply, where your customers are, and where they expect you to be. Don’t open a department store in an area with all restaurants, or all auto supply stores. Go where people go to shop for your type of merchandise. Before even considering this, you need to do demographics research. There are people who do this for a living that can help. So start researching, this is a HUGE part of a new business. As we’ve always said, the three most important parts of retail are Location, Location, Location!

Whenever you open any business, you need to do your research! You want to open where their is not another similar business near you. You also need to know that their is a decent size population of the age group you will be targeting. This list is very extensive and I think you need to do your own research because you are the only one with all the answers required to answer the questions so you can make an informed decision.
